WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for logging this issue. We've moved to a new codebase on GitHub; please try your issue against the new compiler (once possible) and log an issue on the GitHub site if it still reproduces
WorkItem.Description:
The following code:

```
declare module goog.string { }
```

produces the error:

```
error TS1060: Module name cannot be 'string'
```

I realize this is not a bug per se, but this restriction on module names creates a serious problem with interacting with the Google Closure library.

Comments.Message: Unclear on why this is the case; investigating.
Confirmed that these module names are supposed to be legal. A fix is in progress.
